ShouldersBBUprightRow.name: Barbell Upright Row
ShouldersBBUprightRow.preparation: Grasp bar with shoulder width or slightly narrower overhand grip.
ShouldersBBUprightRow.execution: Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersBBUprightRow.comments: Bar can be recieved from barbell rack, standing behind bar midthigh height. See Upright Row Safety.
ShouldersBBUprightRow.synergists: infraspinatus, brachioradialis, serratusanterior, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, teresminor

ShouldersBBWideGripUprightRow.name: Barbell Wide Grip Upright Row
ShouldersBBWideGripUprightRow.preparation: Grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
ShouldersBBWideGripUprightRow.execution: Pull bar to neck with elbows leading. Allow wrists to flex as bar rises. Lower and repeat.
ShouldersBBWideGripUprightRow.comments: Bar can be received from barbell rack, standing behind bar midthigh height. See Upright Row Safety.
ShouldersBBWideGripUprightRow.synergists: infraspinatus, brachioradialis, serratusanterior, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, supraspinatus, trapeziusmiddle, deltoidanterior, trapeziuslower, teresminor
